text.graphutil.title: GraphUtil
text.graphutil.vanillaScale.tooltip: Keep the vanilla scale, or scale the graph from the minimum to the maximum value.
text.graphutil.alwaysShowGraph.tooltip: Always open the graph, without holding ALT key when opening F3.
text.graphutil.preventClipping.tooltip: Prevent the graph from clipping out of its frame when the value is too high.
